name: seedily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that looks dirty or in bad condition and likely to be involved in dishonest or illegal activities: They were staying in the same seedily glamorous hotel that we had visited. A group of seedily dressed men were standing on the corner.
More examplesFewer examplesShe lived in a seedily furnished room in a large house.He found himself standing in a rather seedily furnished room.It's a part of the city that is notorious for its seedily glamorous nightlife.
